content: असाधनीय, असाध्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not to be accomplished or completed, not proper, easy, or capable of being accomplished; नास्ति असाध्यं नाम मनोभुवः <ls>K. 157.</ls> {@--2@} Not capable of being proved. {@--3@} Incurable, irremediable (as a disease or patient); असाध्यः कुरुते कोपं प्राप्ते काले गदो यथा <ls>Śi. 2. 84</ls>; असाध्य इति वैद्येनातुर इव <ls>V. 3</ls>; <ls>Mv. 4. 23</ls>; भिषजामसाध्यं <ls>R. 8. 93.</ls>
